title: Analysis of Acceptance Factors for Online Learning Platforms and Application Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and Educational Technology Tool Usage Experience
context.additional_context: A competency-building program for pre-service and in-service elementary school teachers to design blended (online/offline) social studies classes

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the determinants of online learning platform adoption and apply them to social contexts.
Learners can design personalized online education strategies considering differences in learners' technology acceptance levels.
Through project-based assessment, learners can propose solutions to address potential barriers when introducing a platform.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
